metadata.title: CVE-2024-39478 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:crypto: starfive - Do not free stack bufferRSA text data uses variable length buffer allocated in software stack.Calling kfree on it causes undefined behaviour in subsequent operations.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips-updates/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
